mapper.select: select * from products order by input_date desc

select r.* from(select rownum rn,a.* from (select b.*, trunc(b.rating) as trunc_rating ,nvl(s.count_review,0) as review_cnt from products b left join (select product_no, count(*) as count_review from reviews group by product_no) s on b.product_no = s.product_no where product_name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' or category_code like #{keyword} order by b.product_no desc) a
where rownum <= (#{page} * 9)) r
where r.rn > (#{page} -1) * 9
select count(*) from likes where product_no = #{productNo} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from likes where user_id = #{userId} and product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN NVL(PRE_CATEGORY, 'N') = 'N' THEN 'parent' ELSE '' END AS CATE_1, CASE WHEN NVL(PRE_CATEGORY, 'N') = 'N' THEN CATEGORY_NAME ELSE '' END AS CATE_2, CASE WHEN NVL(PRE_CATEGORY, 'N') = 'N' THEN '' ELSE 'child' END AS CATE_3, CASE WHEN NVL(PRE_CATEGORY, 'N') = 'N' THEN '' ELSE CATEGORY_NAME END AS CATE_4, CATEGORY_CODE FROM CATEGORY C START WITH PRE_CATEGORY IS NULL CONNECT BY PRE_CATEGORY = PRIOR CATEGORY_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY CATEGORY_CODE DESC
mapper.insert: insert into products (category_code, product_no, product_name, price, off_price, product_Img, product_Img2, product_img3, explain_img1, explain_img2) values (#{categoryCode}, PRODUCT_NO_SEQ.nextVal, #{productName}, #{price}, #{offPrice}, #{productImg}, #{productImg2}, #{productImg3}, #{explainImg1}, #{explainImg2})
mapper.select: select category_code as "category_code", category_name as "category_name", pre_category as "pre_category" from category c START WITH PRE_CATEGORY IS NULL CONNECT BY PRE_CATEGORY = PRIOR CATEGORY_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY CATEGORY_CODE
